reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 213/95: RATING BY-LAWS-EXTENSION OF TIME
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 213/95: RATING BY-LAWS-EXTENSION OF TIME
reg_info.act_under: Regional Municipalities Act   Loi sur les municipalités régionales

content.content: 1. For 1995, the time for council of The Regional Municipality of Ottawa-Carleton to pass rating by-laws to raise the general regional levy, including the requirements for police services under section 32.8 of the Regional Municipality of Ottawa-Carleton Act, is extended to May 31, 1995. O. Reg. 213/95, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For 1995, the time for council of The Regional Municipality of Ottawa-Carleton to pass rating by-laws to raise the general regional levy, including the requirements for police services under section 32.8 of the Regional Municipality of Ottawa-Carleton Act, is extended to May 31, 1995. O. Reg. 213/95, s. 1.

content.content: 2. For 1995, the time for council of The Regional Municipality of Ottawa-Carleton to pass its rating by-laws to raise special levies is extended to May 31, 1995. O. Reg. 213/95, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. For 1995, the time for council of The Regional Municipality of Ottawa-Carleton to pass its rating by-laws to raise special levies is extended to May 31, 1995. O. Reg. 213/95, s. 2.
